page.title: 05HOME LIFE ON A FARM
page.content: {Homelife}at Auchterforfar farm is demanding. The family work from 7.30 - 5.00. The farmer's first and last job each day is to check the stock. His most hated job is{ paperwork }which is very time-consuming. However he enjoys {harvesting}if the weather is good as he can see the results of his labour. Although they live out of town they do not miss anything in Forfar. They aren't too isolated and make frequent visits into town. The farmer is a church elder and a crime prevention officer. His wife goes shopping every week. In the evenings his wife knits and reads while the farmer watches TV. They have a collie which is a working dog and only occasionally allowed in the house. Everyone on the farm would recommend farming as a{profession}as they love the countryside.
